releaseNotes.1.10: 08-events - cornelia events: [eventScript] more space needed, new dialogs [mapDialog], new triggers [mapTriggers], new scripts [npcScript], new npcs [npcProperties]
releaseNotes.1.09: 01-maps-cornelia - baron replacement: [mapLayouts] more free space needed, [mapTitle] updated name, [mapProperties] updated properties
releaseNotes.1.08: 06-characters - new jobs [characterJob], new characters [characterID], new stats [characterStats], new character spells [spellList], new character graphics [characterGraphics], new character portraits [portraitGraphics], new character palettes [characterPalette], new character map graphics [mapSpriteGraphics]
releaseNotes.1.07: 06-characters - bigger xp tables: [characterLevelProgression] more free space needed
releaseNotes.1.06: 04-monsters - Issue (battle stops when starting) after editing rom: [monsterProperties] changing reference to match addresses for version 1.1 of the rom
releaseNotes.1.04: 04-monsters - QoL for enemy data: [monsterProperties] limiting monsters list (reduce noise for enemy graphic selection), [monsterPalette] list all enemy graphic palette available, [monsterGraphics] list enemy graphic using pointer value
releaseNotes.1.03: 03-skipOpening - setup new trigger at game start: [eventSwitch] new trigger name, [eventScript] more free space needed
releaseNotes.1.01: 01-worldmap - bigger overworld: [worldLayout0] more free space needed
